tool_description: Analyzes physical accessibility of potential network sites including road access, terrain difficulty, and property ownership status for deployment feasibility.

site_type.description: Type of site: tower, rooftop, small_cell, das

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid site type: Use tower, rooftop, small_cell, or das.
Location analysis failed: Unable to analyze accessibility for the specified location.
Property data unavailable: Property ownership information not available for this location.
usage: Provide latitude, longitude, and site_type for the proposed location. The tool analyzes accessibility factors including road access, terrain challenges, and property considerations.

road_access_quality.description: Quality of road access: excellent, good, fair, poor

terrain_difficulty.description: Terrain difficulty level: easy, moderate, difficult, extreme

property_type.description: Property type: public, private, commercial, residential

access_restrictions.description: List of access restrictions or special requirements
